Constructor Detail

DomainView

public DomainView()
Basic DomainView constructor initializing the manager mapping and creating the view embedding scroll pane. The initialization of the rest is done when the data set is set.

addMouseListeners

public void addMouseListeners()
Description copied from class: AbstractView
abstract method to generally register the mouse listeners for a view.
This method is also called each time the zoom mode is disabled.

Specified by:
addMouseListeners in class AbstractView

removeMouseListeners

public void removeMouseListeners()
Description copied from class: AbstractView
Removes all mouse listeners. This is for instance necessary when the view switches to zoom mode. (e.g. the DomainTooltipRenderer would mess up the coordinates)

Specified by:
removeMouseListeners in class AbstractView
